about_the_game:
Fight yourself through the Void!

Embark on a thrilling journey in this Bullet-Hell Top Down Shooter, Rogue-lite game, where you, as a daring pilot, strive to liberate the world from the Void. Face relentless hordes of over 20 distinct enemy types, each requiring you to adapt your strategy and hone your skills. Your ultimate goal is to reach Stage 20 and defeat the challenging Void Keeper, the final boss who stands between you and victory. With each stage, the intensity escalates, pushing your resilience and strategic thinking to the limit.

Upgrade your Ship!

As you valiantly conquer each wave of adversaries, you are rewarded with the opportunity to select from a variety of upgrades, ranging from Common to Legendary tiers. Each upgrade offers a unique boost, whether it's enhancing your survival capabilities with increased health and movement speed, or boosting your offensive power with reduced cooldowns and higher damage. After every stage, choose from three upgrades, with the option to reroll once, allowing you to tailor your approach and become an unstoppable force as you progress through the stages.

Use powerful Abilities!

Throughout your run, unlock powerful abilities that turn the tide of battle in your favor. Whether it's unleashing devastating explosions, casting mighty lasers, or applying crippling debuffs, each ability adds a thrilling dimension to your combat style. As you draw legendary upgrades, your ship, the Eagle, transforms into a beacon of destruction, feared by enemies and revered by those who witness your prowess. With these abilities, you can tackle the toughest challenges and emerge victorious in the Void.

Persistent Progression!
After each run, your pilot gains experience, allowing you to unlock permanent bonuses such as increased health or more powerful abilities. These persistent upgrades provide you with a strategic advantage in future runs, making each attempt at defeating the Void Keeper a step closer to ultimate victory.

name: Void Reaper
short_description: Pilot your ship through the Void in 'Void Reaper'. Face diverse enemies, upgrade your ship, and battle bosses to reach the End Boss in this action-packed void odyssey. Can you destroy the Void and save the world?
